reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater's beautiful color and appreciate its lightweight design. The temperature range receives mixed feedback - while some find it perfect for chilly northern indoor temperatures, one customer notes it's not very warm. The feel also gets mixed reviews, with one customer describing it as looking and feeling cheap.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, flows beautifully, great length
items.body: I'm 5'2", broad shoulders, athletic build, and this is my new favorite sweater. It IS lightweight, so it's not going to keep you very warm, but it's a good fall or spring weight. It's dead of winter now, and I wore it yesterday with a lightweight thermal shirt, scarf, and arm warmers and it was an elegant mid-layer, perfect for chilly northern indoor temperatures. If you're short, finding sweaters that hang just right is difficult - most are too long, or too short (cropped fad, I'm looking at you). This one skims the hips, covering the top of my jeans or trousers, but does not cover my ass - which to me is the perfect length. Why cover one of my best parts and in the process make it look bigger and like I'm trying to hide it? The length makes it very flattering, as if it was made to measure. The lightweight cashmere means that it hangs and moves with elegance. I was lucky and got it on sale - I will keep an eye on it for any future sales. I could do with 3 or 4 of these. Read more
items.author: Vanderwoman

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Looks and feels cheap.
items.body: This looks and feels super cheap. I don’t think it’s really cashmere. I would never buy this. Nothing like I expected. So glad Amazon makes it easy to send things back. Read more
items.author: MP

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely but see through
items.body: The fabric is lovely, the sweater is lovely, but you can see right through it Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Lightweight, soft, beautiful color and loose fit! Exactly what I was looking for! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's thin
items.body: The sweater is so thin it's see thru and definitely isn't for winter. I paid to much ! Read more
items.author: Cheryl Walton

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cashmere sweater
items.body: Not a quality cashmere sweater that you normally would expect from Amazon or any notable retailer. Read more
items.author: Did not receive Oral B as I ‘thought’ I had ordered... The product description was somewhat deceiving.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and light weight
items.body: This was a gift to my daughter-in-law for Christmas, and she loved it. She wore it Christmas Day for the family gathering and looked lovely. The sweater is very light weight, perfect for winter where the temperatures are not really cold. Read more
items.author: Austin Transplant

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin but soft
items.body: This is a very thin sweater, so it doesn't really hold it's shape which makes it a little difficult to style. It's not baggy enough to wear it in a casual way, but it's rather shapeless, so unless you're very slender (even then it will not be terribly flattering) it's going to cling on all the parts you might not want to accentuate. It's very soft but I'm disappointment. Read more
items.author: Maximum Verbosity

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Shell, White, Cement, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
